alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:57PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Grand Forks, northwestern Traill and northeastern Steele Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 657 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hatton, or 23 miles southwest of Grand Forks, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwood and Hatton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern North Dakota.
